name: Destory&Repair
description:
I made this game in GGJ2020.

This is a 2D Top-Down puzzle game. In this game, you will act as a wried guy who has a magic gun. The gun has two forms. The first one has the power to destroy the terrain while the other can repair what you destroyed. You will need to use your gun to clear the way to your goal, and only if you repair everything you've destroyed can you pass the level. Enjoy! 

X - Fire 

Z - Switch Gun 

Arrow Key - Move
